api_contracts.description: Returns a simple Hello World greeting message

component_logic.responsibility: Handles GET /hello requests and returns Hello World response with timestamp

interfaces.description: Returns Hello World response with current timestamp
Formats response with message, status, and timestamp

component_logic.implementation_notes: Return exactly 'Hello World' as message. Include 'success' status and current UTC timestamp in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.fffffZ). Use datetime.utcnow().isoformat() + 'Z' for timestamp generation. Response must be JSON serializable dict.

component_logic.responsibility: Defines the FastAPI route configuration for the /hello endpoint

interfaces.description: Registers the /hello GET route with the FastAPI application

component_logic.implementation_notes: Use FastAPI @app.get('/hello') decorator. Set response_model to dict[str, str]. Include summary='Get Hello World message' and description='Returns a simple Hello World greeting with timestamp'. Handle any exceptions and return 500 error response.

design_review_checklist.description: Verify proper separation of concerns between handler and router
design_review_checklist.validation_criteria: HelloWorldHandler contains business logic (message formatting, timestamp generation). HelloWorldRouter only handles HTTP routing and delegates to handler.

design_review_checklist.description: Verify response format matches API contract exactly
design_review_checklist.validation_criteria: Response must contain exactly three fields: 'message' (Hello World), 'status' (success), 'timestamp' (ISO 8601 UTC). No additional or missing fields.

design_review_checklist.description: Verify proper error handling for unexpected failures
design_review_checklist.validation_criteria: Router must catch all exceptions and return 500 status with INTERNAL_ERROR code. No unhandled exceptions should crash the application.
Use datetime.utcnow().isoformat() for timestamp generation. No expensive operations in the handler. Response time should be under 10ms.

design_review_checklist.description: Verify component dependencies are minimal and correct
design_review_checklist.validation_criteria: HelloWorldHandler has no dependencies. HelloWorldRouter depends only on HelloWorldHandler. No circular dependencies.

design_review_checklist.description: Verify timestamp format is consistent and valid
design_review_checklist.validation_criteria: Timestamp must be UTC timezone, ISO 8601 format with 'Z' suffix. Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.fffffZ. Must be parseable by standard ISO 8601 parsers.

architecture_overview: Simple single-endpoint REST API with two-layer architecture: Router layer (HelloWorldRouter) handles HTTP concerns and route registration, Handler layer (HelloWorldHandler) contains business logic for message formatting and timestamp generation. No database or external dependencies required. Stateless design with immediate response generation.
assumptions: No authentication or authorization required for /hello endpoint
Timestamp precision to microseconds is acceptable
UTC timezone is appropriate for all users
No rate limiting required for this simple endpoint
No logging or monitoring requirements specified
